# retvod: Retrieve VOD 

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of retvod is to retrieve VOD from tower based radiometer using the tau omega model and test other retrieval algorithms.

## Installation

You can install the development version of `retvod` like so:

``` r
library(pak)
pak::pak("brownegm/retvod")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
#library(retvod)
## basic example code
```
